Message 495 of 4024
May I come get AD for juicy steaks and a movie? We loved hanging last night and he is asking to do it again today. Let’s put our differences aside and
let’s just reassure him that we will sort our stuff out, but he is never going to be out in the middle. Let’s please do the right thing by him.

Subject:Re: Adrian

No. Not until I get further guidance. I am not going to do that after the concerns he raised directly with me.
You didn’t just do it to me Robert. It was the entire family. I still don’t believe you understand the implications or the ramifications of your actions.
